Library

Module

Matroids.Matroids — Module
Matroids

A Julia package for matroids.

The basic constructor is Matroid.

Types

Matroids.AbstractMatroid — Type
AbstractMatroid

An abstract type representing a matroid.

Functions

Matroids.Matroid — Function
Matroid(groundset=nothing, data=nothing; kwargs...)

Construct a matroid.

You will need to provide a graph or a matrix as data, or one of the optional kwargs.

Arguments

  • groundset : labels for the groundset of the matroid
  • data : a matrix or a graph
  • bases : optional; the set of bases of the matroid
  • independentsets : optional; the set of the independent sets of the matroid
  • circuits : optional; the set of circuits of the matroid
  • matroid : optional; an existing matroid
Base.size — Method
size(M)

Return the size of the groundset of the matroid M.

Matroids.bases — Method
bases(M)

Return all the bases of the matroid M.

Matroids.basis — Method
basis(M)

Return an arbitrary basis of the matroid M.

Matroids.circuit — Method
circuit(M, X)

Return a circuit of M contained in X. Otherwise raise an error. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.circuit — Method
circuit(M)

Return a circuit of M if one exists. Otherwise raise an error.

Matroids.circuitclosures — Method
circuitclosures(M)

Return all the circuit closures of the matroid M.

Matroids.circuits — Method
circuits(M)

Return all the circuits of the matroid M.

Matroids.closure — Method
closure(M, X)

Return the closure of X in matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.cobasis — Method
cobasis(M)

Return an arbitrary cobasis of the matroid M.

Matroids.cocircuit — Method
cocircuit(M, X)

Return a cocircuit of M contained in X. Otherwise raise an error. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.cocircuit — Method
cocircuit(M)

Return a cocircuit of M if one exists. Otherwise raise an error.

Matroids.cocircuits — Method
cocircuits(M)

Return all the cocircuits of the matroid M.

Matroids.coclosure — Method
coclosure(M, X)

Return the coclosure of X in matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.coloops — Method
coloops(M)

Return all the coloops of the matroid M.

Matroids.corank — Method
corank(M, X)

Return the corank of the subset X in the matroid M. X shold be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.corank — Method
corank(M)

Return the corank of the matroid M. Equivalent to fullcorank(M).

Matroids.flats — Method
flats(M, r)

Return all the flats of rank r in the matroid M.

Matroids.fullcorank — Method
fullcorank(M)

Return the corank of the matroid M. Equivalent to corank(M).

Matroids.fullrank — Method
fullrank(M)

Return the rank of the matroid M. Equivalent to rank(M).

Matroids.fundamentalcircuit — Method
fundamentalcircuit(M, B, e)

Return the B-fundamental circuit using e in matroid M. This is the unique matroid circuit contained in $B \cup e$. B should be a basis of M and e should be an element of M not in B.

Matroids.fundamentalcocircuit — Method
fundamentalcircuit(M, B, e)

Return the B-fundamental cocircuit using e in matroid M. This is the unique matroid cocircuit that intersects B only at e. B should be a basis of M and e should be an element of M not in B.

Matroids.groundset — Method
groundset(M)

Return the groundset of the matroid M.

Matroids.independentsets — Method
independentsets(M)

Return all the independent sets of the matroid M.

Matroids.isbasis — Method
isbasis(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is a basis in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscircuit — Method
iscircuit(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is a circuit in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.isclosed — Method
isclosed(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is closed in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscobasis — Method
iscobasis(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is a cobasis in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscocircuit — Method
iscocircuit(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is a cocircuit in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscoclosed — Method
iscoclosed(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is coclosed in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscodependent — Method
iscodependent(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is codependent in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.iscoindependent — Method
iscoindependent(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is coindependent in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.isdependent — Method
isdependent(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is dependent in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.isindependent — Method
isindependent(M, X)

Test whether the subset X is independent in the matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.isvalidmatroid — Method
isvalidmatroid(M)

Test whether M is a valid matroid, i.e. it satisfies the matroid axioms.

Matroids.loops — Method
loops(M)

Return all the loops of the matroid M.

Matroids.maxcoindependent — Method
maxcoindependent(M, X)

Return a maximal coindependent subset of X in matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.maxindependent — Method
maxindependent(M, X)

Return a maximal independent subset of X in matroid M. X should be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.nonbases — Method
nonbases(M)

Return all the nonbases of the matroid M.

Matroids.rank — Method
rank(M, X)

Return the rank of the subset X in the matroid M. X shold be a subset of the groundset of M.

Matroids.rank — Method
rank(M)

Return the rank of the matroid M. Equivalent to fullrank(M).

Matroids.isisomorphic — Method
isisomorphic(M, N)

Test whether matroids M and N are isomorphic.
